original_title: Augsburger Puppenkiste - Bill Bo und seine Kumpane
overview: Bill Bo and his gang pull through the country, always looking for adventure. They plunder here a little and there a little rob. But Bill Bo has a big goal: The Dingelstein castle. Together with his companions, he plans the attack. But he has not reckoned with the castle residents Ding-Ding, Wally and Willi.
title: Augsburger Puppenkiste - Bill Bo und seine Kumpane
